title: Smartwatch Universal Remote
summary: Control all your devices with your Android Wear smartwatch!

description: The first app that allows you to use your Android Wear watch as a universal remote control!Control your TV, your Set-top Box, your Audio Video Receiver, your Sound System, your Amplifier, your DVD Player, your Blu-ray Player, your Media or Streaming Player, your Air Conditioner, your Projector, your DSLR camera, your PS3, your Xbox, and more, directly through your watch!This app is an extension of the Galaxy Universal Remote which will have to be installed on your phone or tablet to send the IR commands to your devices. You can leave your phone at the table and control your devices directly through your watch.Note:The app requires a phone with a built-in IR blaster.In case you need anything simply send us an email at support@moletag.com. Our friendly team is always here to assist you.In addition, if you are not happy with the app or if the app doesn't work with your device just send us your order number and we will instantly refund you. We offer a lifetime return policy.
descriptionHTML:
The first app that allows you to use your Android Wear watch as a universal remote control!


Control your TV, your Set-top Box, your Audio Video Receiver, your Sound System, your Amplifier, your DVD Player, your Blu-ray Player, your Media or Streaming Player, your Air Conditioner, your Projector, your DSLR camera, your PS3, your Xbox, and more, directly through your watch!

This app is an extension of the Galaxy Universal Remote which will have to be installed on your phone or tablet to send the IR commands to your devices. You can leave your phone at the table and control your devices directly through your watch.

Note:
The app requires a phone with a built-in IR blaster.

In case you need anything simply send us an email at support@moletag.com. Our friendly team is always here to assist you.

In addition, if you are not happy with the app or if the app doesn't work with your device just send us your order number and we will instantly refund you. We offer a lifetime return policy.
comments: Great This app is really useful thanks to good wear support. It will get 5 stars when we get vcr & smart controls for tv's
UPDATE Good concept and it works but my frequency is radio. Good app to buy

Awesome app. Worth the money! Awesome app. Please know you must have another app installed and paid for to use this app. But when you have it, this app works great and is super easy to set up.  One feature request: Could you add a full page number keypad as one of the custom screens? I would love to be able to flick to a custom page on y watch that has all 10 numbers and a select button.
Moto360 w/HTC One Max.. nice! Nice addition for us Android Wear Smart Watch folks. Thanks for making my Moto360 even more functional.

Very good application This is a very good application but as I have been led to understand the app uses the IR port in the phone so unless your phone NOT watch has an IR port then don't try this application. If your phone does however have the IR port then this is a really nice easy app to use.
recentChanges: · You can now control your devices without the need of a Bluetooth connection, as long as your phone and your watch are both connected to the Internet (requires a Wi-Fi compatible watch that is running Android 5.1.1 or later)
· Fixed a bug where the app could not be installed on some watches
